content: तड् {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (ताडयति-ते, ताडित) {@--1@} To beat, strike (in general), dash against; गाहंतां महिषा निपानसलिलं शृंगैर्मुहस्ताडितं <ls>Ś. 2. 5</ls>; (नौः) ताडिता मारुतैर्यथा <ls>Rām.</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 61</ls>; <ls>Ku. 5. 24</ls>; <ls>Bh. 1. 50.</ls> {@--2@} To beat. strike, punish by beating, hit; लालयेत्पंच वर्षाणि दश वर्षाणि ताडयेत् <ls>Chāṇ. 11</ls>, <ls n="Chāṇ.">12</ls>; न ताडयेत्तृणेनापि <ls>Ms. 4. 169</ls>; पादेन यस्ताड्यते <ls>Amaru. 52.</ls> {@--3@} To strike, beat (as a drum); ताड्यमानासुभेरीषु <ls>Mb.</ls>; अताडयन् मृदंगांश्च <ls>Bk. 17. 7</ls>; <ls>Ve. 1. 22.</ls> {@--4@} To play on, strike the wires of (a musical instrument); श्रोतुर्वितंत्रीरिव ताड्यमाना <ls>Ku. 1. 45.</ls> {@--5@} To shine. {@--6@} To speak. {@--7@} (In <ab>astr.</ab>) To strike against, touch, obscure or eclipse partially. {@--8@} (In <ab>Math.</ab>) To multiply.
